original_text: And whenever the cloud lifted from over the tent, after that the people of Israel set out, and in the place where the cloud settled down, there the people of Israel camped.
korean_text: 구름이 성막에서 떠오르는 때에는 이스라엘 자손이 곧 행진하였고 구름이 머무는 곳에 이스라엘 자손이 진을 쳤으니

sentences.original_text: And whenever the cloud lifted from over the tent,
sentences.korean_translation: 구름이 장막 위에서 들려 올라갈 때마다,

sentences.original_text: after that the people of Israel set out,
and in the place where the cloud settled down,
there the people of Israel camped.
